00038 class RGB {
00039 public:
00044         RGB(float red = 0.0, float green = 0.0, float blue = 0.0) {
00045                 r = red;
00046                 g = green;
00047                 b = blue;
00048         }
00050         union {
00051                 float color[3];
00052                 struct {
00053                         float r;
00054                         float g;
00055                         float b;
00056                 };
00057         };
00058 };
00059 
00065 class HSL {
00066 public:
00071         HSL(double hue = 0.0, double saturation = 0.0, double luminance = 0.0) {
00072                 h= hue;
00073                 s = saturation;
00074                 l = luminance;
00075         }
00077         union {
00078                 double data[3];
00079                 struct {
00080                         double h;
00081                         double s;
00082                         double l;
00083                 };
00084         };
00085 };
